ORG.oclc.oai.server.verb
Class ServerVerb

java.lang.Object
  ORG.oclc.oai.server.verb.ServerVerb
Direct Known Subclasses:
BadVerb, GetMetadata, GetRecord, Identify, ListIdentifiers, ListMetadataFormats, ListRecords, ListSets, Redirect
public abstract class ServerVerb
extends java.lang.Object

ServerVerb is the parent class for each of the server-side OAI verbs.

Author:
Jefffrey A. Young, OCLC Online Computer Library Center
